#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Have Fun
#Text=Paddle Boating
#Text=Are you going paddle Boating ?
#Text=Think it 's going to be boring ?
#Text=Do n't worry , this article will show you how to have a fun and memorable time .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Find a park or lake that rents out paddle boats .
#Text=If you own a paddle boat , skip this step .
#Text=Before renting one
#Text=check the place you 're renting out from in advance .
#Text=Check for ducks ( they can carry swimmer 's itch ) , dead fish , etc. Check the paddle boats to make sure they 're not falling apart and are in good condition .
#Text=Find friends or loved ones to go with !
#Text=It 's never fun to paddle boat alone .
#Text=Talk to them about their schedules , and when they 're open .
#Text=Consider splitting the price .
#Text=Tell them what they need to bring - bathing suit , towels , sunscreen , etc.
#Text=Before going paddle boating , gather the supplies you 'll need .
#Text=Water bottles , towels , etc.
#Text=Make sure to bring more than you need in case someone 's forgotten to bring it .
#Text=Go and pick up your friends and or loved ones and drive to your destination !
#Text=When you get there , have one person pay for renting or place your boat near the water .
#Text=It 's generally considered polite for you to do this .
#Text=Now get dressed and put on some sun screen .
#Text=Choose the two people that are going to be paddling first .
#Text=Decide how you 're going to rotate through the seats .
#Text=Let the people sitting in the back go first , then the paddlers .
#Text=Have the people in the front back up and head for the middle of the lake .
#Text=If you 're the people in the back , look for fish , go leach searching , let your feet drag in the water , just have fun !
#Text=Soon you 'll be paddling , so enjoy the time that you have to kick back and relax !
#Text=Switch every every ten minutes or so , and stay fair .
#Text=An argument would ruin your boating trip .
#Text=If you 're the person in the front , ask everybody where they want to go .
#Text=If there are children on the boat , pretend you 're a pirate captain , and say things like " Land ho ! " or other pirate sayings .
#Text=Chat !
#Text=Even if your paddling .
#Text=if you do n't know what to say , say something like , " Is n't it hot out ? "
#Text=or " How was it at work today ? "
#Text=However , make sure to let everybody talk , so no one feels left out .
#Text=If possible , bring a waterproof camera with you .
#Text=You can make a scrapbook !
#Text=If you do n't have a waterproof camera with you , do n't bring it .
#Text=If you drop it , and it 's not waterproof , it will break and possibly sink .
#Text=Have fun paddle boating !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Always wear a life jacket , even if you can swim .
#Text=In some places it is n't legal to paddle boat without a life jacket , and it 's safer anyway .
#Text=If someone wants to stop paddling , let them walk out of the boat .
#Text=Never move the boat when their walking , or they 'll fall in and might be hurt or upset .
#Text=Make sure you tell somebody where you 're going first just in case something happens .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Always keep a close eye on children .
#Text=Never bring any electronics with you , unless they 're waterproof .
